QuestData.Title: Return to Karazhan: The Tower of Power
QuestData.Description:
Your champions discovered that the area surrounding Karazhan is under an invasion from the Legion. This does not bode well.
Climb the tower, and defeat all in your path.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Viz'aduum the Watcher in Karazhan.

Objectives.Objective: Defeat Viz'aduum the Watcher in Karazhan
